attributes.title: Chapter 1
attributes.caption: For those of you just joining us...
attributes.description: Simmons gets a visit from an old friend, who gets more than he bargained for; meanwhile the rest of the Reds deal with the newly-anointed deity of the desert.

attributes.title: Chapter 2
attributes.caption: Drink Your Ovaltine
attributes.description: Sarge and Grif hatch a plan to make some plans. Simmons and Doc cower in fear while Epsilon continues his roundness.

attributes.title: Chapter 3
attributes.caption: Upon Further Review
attributes.description: Sarge and Grif attempt to rescue Simmons from his imprisonment at Valhalla.

attributes.title: Chapter 4
attributes.caption: Recovering One
attributes.description: Meanwhile, Simmons and Doc are in a diabolical pickle!

attributes.title: Chapter 5
attributes.caption: Fourth And Twenty
attributes.description: The Reds return victorious to find the Blues in a bit of a situation.

attributes.title: Chapter 6
attributes.caption: Towing Package
attributes.description: Caboose talks to an old friend while Wash and Meta get stonewalled by Doc.

attributes.title: Chapter 7
attributes.caption: And Don't Call Me Shirley
attributes.description: Blue Team travels to a secret facility and meets and old friend. Red Team tags along, leaving Tucker to fend for himself.

attributes.title: Chapter 8
attributes.caption: Perusing The Archive
attributes.description: Epsilon and Caboose look for the Director's personal project while Wash and the Meta track down a recovery beacon.

attributes.title: Chapter 9
attributes.caption: Backup Plans
attributes.description: The Red and Blues discover what the Director's secret project is.

attributes.title: Chapter 10
attributes.caption: This One Goes to Eleven
attributes.description: Agent Tex catches up on some lost time.

attributes.title: Chapter 11
attributes.caption: Restraining Orders
attributes.description: Epsilon and Tex have a show down for the ages.

attributes.title: Chapter 12
attributes.caption: Snooze Button
attributes.description: Epsilon tries to unlock the Reds while Wash and Doc investigate The Meta's discovery.

attributes.title: Chapter 13
attributes.caption: Battle of the Exes
attributes.description: Epsilon tries to unlock Tex while Wash and The Meta come up with an evil plan.

attributes.title: Chapter 14
attributes.caption: Reconfiguration
attributes.description: Wash and the Meta concoct an evil plan while Church and Tex try to sort out the past.

attributes.title: Chapter 15
attributes.caption: Check Your Local Listings
attributes.description: Grif and Simmons find some interesting equipment.

attributes.title: Chapter 16
attributes.caption: Standardized Testing
attributes.description: The Reds test out some Freelancer equipment while Church and Tex arrive at a familiar Freelancer facility.

attributes.title: Chapter 19
attributes.caption: Reunion
attributes.description: Tex executes her trap, fights Wash & Meta in an epic battle.

attributes.title: Chapter 20; The Finale
attributes.caption: n+1
attributes.description: The final installment of Revelation. The Reds and Blues take on Meta in their ultimate battle.
